instructions: Tap the App Store on your device. Tap Search at the bottom of the screen. In the search bar at the top of the screen, type "Messenger" and tap the Search button on the virtual keyboard. Tap the Get button next to the Messenger app to start the download.

Tap your image to the left of the search bar at the top of the Messenger app Home screen. Tap Availability in the screen that opens. Move the slider next to Availability to the Off position. In the confirmation screen, tap Turn Off .
